data.text:
@ThePerezHilton He is deadbeat, abuser, alcoholic, his kids hate him, on & on... 
His kids don’t want him, he can’t force the kids to live with him as they’re still traumatised of what he did to them, kids never forget.

@NorahMackenzie @ThePerezHilton AJ fans stopped visiting his site years ago.. Now he's depending on the deadbeats deplorable fans but even most of them don't like him. 😂 next he'll be looking for hits from trump fans.
@ThePerezHilton Angie stop it. It will hurt the kids not having their father be in their lives would u want to be excluded in their lives if the tables were turned ?

@ThePerezHilton Can’t understand why a mother wants to tear the kids away from their father. Maybe Angelina is having separation from Brad anxiety? And...why did all this happen after she went through medically induced menopause? Makes you go hmmmm....
@IntnBusinessNet @ThePerezHilton And i hope the judge goes after her for her vindictiveness - just harmful to everyone around her.
@ThePerezHilton She used her kids to control him to marry her. This is about money.  Not her kids. Greedy witch.

@ThePerezHilton She needs to give in you’ll be hard pressed to find a judge that won’t say 50/50 especially when he’s supportive, loving, not a dead beat dad and is willing to be there for all his kids. Why would she say no? Just to hurt him? That’s sad
